Sanofi.Definition: A multinational pharmaceutical company headquartered in Paris, France, that is the world's fifth-largest by prescription sales (as of 2014). The company was formed as Sanofi-Aventis by the merger of Aventis and Sanofi-Synthélabo, which were each the product of several previous mergers. It has since changed its name to Sanofi. (Adapted from Wikipedia)
